metadata.title: CVE-2021-41260 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Galette is a membership management web application built for non profitorganizations and released under GPLv3. Versions prior to 0.9.6 do notcheck for Cross Site Request Forgery attacks. All users are advised toupgrade to 0.9.6 as soon as possible. There are no known workarounds forthis issue.

criterions.comment: galette: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
